title: MoCC extends last date for submission of entries in National Content Competition 2025
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 19 (APP):Ministry of Climate Change (MoCC) has extended the last date for submission of entries in National Content Competition 2025, on climate change and environment till July 1. Earlier, the last date of submission of entries in the competition was June 23.
“Participate in the National Content Competition 2025 and share your voice through short videos, reels, photo essays or posts. Let the world hear your message”, said a post of the Ministry of Climate Change on its Facebook page.
The participants can send their short videos, photo essays, reels or posts on social media platforms with tag@ClimateChangePK, by using hashtags#Voices4Nature,#GreenPakistan,#YouthForClimate,#MyClimateStory.
The participants can also add their content with a caption to a Google Drive folder and email folder link to:digitalmedia@mocc.gov.pk with the subject “National Content Competition 2025”.
Those who do not want to post their content on social media can send their entries directly by creating a Google Drive folder with their work and caption.Then they should share folder link with Ministry of Climate Change at
